title: René Fernández
text:
Rene Fernandez (born 1 January 1906, in <a href="Bolivia">Bolivia</a>, death in 1956) was a Bolivian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">Forward</a>.
Career.
During his career he has made two appearances for the Bolivia national team at the <a href="1930%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1930 FIFA World Cup</a>.
